data.title: Yummy cobb salad, great vibe
data.text:
I was in Escondido on business and checked a review site for local establishments. I never would have found this place otherwise, but I'm glad I did. The cobb salad was yummy. They certainly did not skimp on the chicken, but I would have liked some more avocado. 

The guy who made my salad was super friendly. I wish this place was closer to home. I would definitely go back.

data.title: Perfect little brunch spot!
data.text:
This is such a cute little place! Great use of space, nice ambiance, and very pleasant staff. I had a breakfast panini with a cup of clam chowder. Excellent depth of familiar, satisfying, and a wonderful value. Oh, and a glass of real lemonade! We sat outside and enjoyed the lovely spring day. 

Loved the crispy cheesy herbed bread! Nice touch. 

Wish we had room for one of those gluten-free strawberry white chocolate chip muffins!

data.title: Lunch time
data.text: Again...best grilled cheese and I love the mango green iced tea. Sweet spot to take a minute away from my desk!

data.title: Not splendid!
data.text: After reading all reviews, i tried this restaurant.  I am sorry, but my rate is very low because my my expectations are too high. Grilled chicken with spinach was mediocre.  Two slices of bread with shredded chicken pieces (1 TBS) on George Forman grill.  It is no worth $10.  Unfortunately, my expectations are very high, especially after tasting the wonderful styles of panini all over Italy.  Definitely thumbs down 👎

data.title: Yummy Breakfast
data.text: This is a cute little place, that's full of flavor.  I've only had the breakfast panini and coffee but both are excellent. Both are prepared fresh after you order.  The owners are present and friendly.  They open early, 6:30am, so it's easy to get something on the go before work.  I will be going back for lunch!

data.title: Great lunch get away.
data.text: I've now had the grilled cheese panini last week and today the tuna melt. Both were very good! I comes with a small risotto salad cup, a pickle spear and a choice of cookie. Very fresh and perfect size for lunch! You can call ahead if you need it to go. I sit out at the little bistro tables to enjoy the scenery.

data.title: Yummy breakfast
data.text: I had breakfast here with a couple if my friends one morning. I got a breakfast pannini.  It was really yummy, but it was too small. Especially for the price. It would be good if you could get a side with the breakfast sandwiches.  Maybe fruit or potatoes.
